title: Chinese Jiaozi (Potsticker dumplings)
ingredients: ['225g minced pork', '1/2 medium head cabbage, finely chopped', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '2 slices fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '2 water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '400g wonton wrappers', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '175ml water', '1 tablespoon chilli oil', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon rice vinegar']
